entry.title: Instructions for Surviving a Gotham Heatwave
entry.summary:
Author: ziptiesand

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,810Chapters: 5/22Kudos: 7

Summary: Clark is not getting the romantic summer vacation Bruce promised, and instead, has been assigned the company of one Zatanna Zatara while Bruce continues to work on another ever-important, ever-urgent case in Gotham. The thing is, this would all be fine and normal, if Zatanna's heart wasn't constantly skipping a beat whenever Clark was around, or if she and Bruce weren't teetering on the edge of spilling their guts out to each other at any given moment.Meanwhile, Red Hood is on the verge of another Lazarus Pit-induced mental breakdown, Nightwing is only just starting to remember that his name is not, in fact, Ric Grayson, and they keep crossing paths while on a case. Cue cat-and-mouse chases across rooftops, trips to Zatanna's parlour of magical cognitive therapy, and an undercover drugs bust at The Iceberg Lounge, where ex crime-lord Red Hood might get more than he bargained for with his interim partner in crime.It's going to be an interesting summer.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,765Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 547

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother‚Äîthe one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,359Chapters: 7/46Kudos: 75

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all.Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... Around Christmas?

entry.title: Transference
entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,007Chapters: 11/16Kudos: 121

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage‚Äî with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness.Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy‚Äî especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury.Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. Not even family.
